txt.en: After discovering a number of intact Orkish arrows left behind at Zarkul-sulûn, Rádek has devised a plan to 'return' them to the Orcs of Gundabad.
'Do not worry, [placeholder].\n\n'We Zhélruka will make sure every last arrow is returned to Gorgar and his Orcs! Hah!'
Zhélruka archers can be found at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou have collected the Orkish arrows and should now deliver them to Zhélruka archers at Zarkul-sulûn.
Rádek can be found at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou have armed the Zhélruka archers and should now report back to Rádek.

'Bah! The Orcs at Zarkul-sulûn were weak!

'I am as pleased as Glóin that we have gained a new foothold, but many battles still await us.

'Look around you, [placeholder]. Countless Orkish arrows litter the ground and many of them are still intact. There is a tradition in my family to always return a lost weapon to its rightful owner. In the case of the Orcs of Gundabad, it seems only fitting that the keen-eyed archers of the Zhélruka 'return' them.

'Find as many intact arrows as you can. I will see that each Orc shall have one in their time!'
Delivered Orkish arrows at Zhélruka archers at Zarkul-sulûn ([placeholder]/3)
Deliver Orkish arrows at Zhélruka archers at Zarkul-sulûn ([placeholder]/3)
'You'll forgive me if I return two of these to one Orc, kízinek?'
'I'll save the last of these for Gorgar!'
'Better in the hands of a Zhélruka, I say!'
Intact Orkish arrows can be found scattered in the ground at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nHoping to arm Zhélruka archers, Rádek has asked you to collect intact Orkish arrows from the ground at Zarkul-sulûn.
'Not quite sharp enough... good! It will sting the Orcs!'
Collected bundles of intact Orkish arrows at Zarkul-sulûn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect bundles of intact Orkish arrows at Zarkul-sulûn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
